title: Warm Clothes for Dhaka
description: Donate winter clothing to help underprivileged communities in Dhaka stay warm.

title: Hygiene Kits for Sylhet
description: Distribute hygiene kits to families in Sylhet to ensure good health.

description: Support the residents of Chittagong with warm jackets this winter season.

title: Blankets for Sylhet
description: Provide warm blankets to families in Sylhet to shield them from the winter cold.
